alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 2:14PM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...The Northern Black Hills and the Northern Foot Hills. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
